programme.title: Snowpiercer, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: After a failed global-warming experiment, a post-apocalyptic Ice Age has killed off nearly all life on the planet.

programme.title: Criminal, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: The memories and skills of a deceased CIA agent are implanted into an unpredictable and dangerous convict in order to complete the agent's final assignment.

programme.title: Minority Report, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: In the future, a division of the police department has the technology to arrest killers before they commit crimes; however, the tables turn on one of the cops working within the division.

programme.title: Annihilation, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: A biologist and former solider (Natalie Portman) must lead a mission into a mysterious quarantine zone known as The Shimmer, a beautiful but deadly world of mutated landscapes and creatures that threatens all life on Earth. Also starring Oscar Isaac.

programme.title: War of the Worlds, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: A contemporary retelling of H.G.Wells' classic, the sci-fi thriller reveals the extraordinary battle for the future of humankind through the eyes of one American family.

programme.title: Minority Report, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: In the future, a division of the police department has the technology to arrest killers before they commit crimes; however, the tables turn on one of the cops working within the division.

programme.title: Looper, (2012, Thriller)
programme.desc: In this futuristic action thriller, time travel will be illegal and only available on the black market. When the mob wants to get rid of someone, they will send their target 30 years into the past where a 'looper,' a hired gun, is waiting to mop up.

programme.title: Interstellar, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: From director Christopher Nolan (Inception) comes the story of ex-pilot Cooper (Matthew McConaughey), who must leave his family and Earth behind to lead an expedition beyond this galaxy to discover whether mankind has a future among the stars.

programme.title: The Big Sombrero, (1949, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene heads South in a fiesta of melody and a jamboree of romance. He fights for the right of rancheros to live on their rancho. Outlaws fear him and senoritas cheer him, and his famous horse Champion.

programme.title: The Cowboy And The Indians, (1949, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry runs in to opposition when he tries to aid starving Navajos. The Chief is found unconscious and his necklace gone. Lakohna, the successor, is blamed. Gene and Lakohna join to seek justice.

programme.title: Geronimo, (1962, Drama)
programme.desc: In 1883, Geronimo and his small group of Apache warriors, under constant attack from both U.S. and Mexican military forces, reluctantly surrender in exchange for food and land. But promises are broken, and the Apaches declare all-out war on the U.S.

programme.title: Sam Whiskey, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: Welcome to America's Wild - and very wacky - West! Burt Reynolds, Clint Walker, Ossie Davis and Angie Dickinson star in this tongue-in-cheek tale of love, lust and larceny as an amiable con-artist is hire by a sexy widow to break into the U.S. Mint.

programme.title: Stagecoach, (1939, Drama)
programme.desc: Dallas is a woman with a past who has been driven out of town by the high-minded ladies of the community. Lucy Mallory is the wife of a cavalry officer stationed in Lordsburg, and she's determined to be with him.

programme.title: The Horse Soldiers, (1959, Western)
programme.desc: John Wayne, Constance Towers and William Holden star in this 1863, fact-based story about a Union mission to destroy a railroad junction deep within Confederate territory.

programme.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance, (1962, Drama)
programme.desc: Jimmy Stewart plays the bungling but charming big-city lawyer determined to rid the fair village of Shinbone of its number one nuisance and bad man: Liberty Valance.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven, (1960, Drama)
programme.desc: Yul Brynner stars as one of seven gunslingers pitted against an army of marauding bandits in this rousing classic that made stars of Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, and James Coburn. Eli Wallach also stars in this timeless tale of good versus evil.

programme.title: Return Of The Seven, (1966, Drama)
programme.desc: Starring Yul Brynner and a stellar supporting cast that includes Robert Fuller, Warren Oates and Claude Akins, this classic western adventure follows the legendary Magnificent Seven as they thunder through Mexico to face the shootout of their lives!

programme.title: Tropic Thunder, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ben Stiller, Jack Black and Robert Downey Jr. lead an ensemble cast in 'Tropic Thunder,' an action comedy about a group of self-absorbed actors who set out to make the most expensive war film.

programme.title: Stranger Than Fiction, (2006, Drama)
programme.desc: An IRS auditor suddenly finds himself the subject of narration only he can hear: narration that begins to affect his entire life, from his work, to his love-interest, to his death.

programme.title: Ghost Town, (2008, Screwball)
programme.desc: A spirited romantic comedy, Ghost Town is the story of Bertram Pincus, a cranky Manhattan dentist who develops the unwelcome ability to see dead people.

programme.title: Tropic Thunder, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ben Stiller, Jack Black and Robert Downey Jr. lead an ensemble cast in 'Tropic Thunder,' an action comedy about a group of self-absorbed actors who set out to make the most expensive war film.

programme.title: Adventureland, (2009, Screwball)
programme.desc: From the director of SUPERBAD comes a coming-of-age comedy of big dreams, hysterical consequences, and young love, set in a run-down amusement park.

programme.title: Across the Universe, (2007, Musical)
programme.desc: A love story about a British boy and an American girl set against the backdrop of the social upheaval of the 1960s.

programme.title: Catch Me If You Can, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: From three-time Oscar-winning director Steven Spielberg, Catch Me If You Can follows Frank W. Abagnale, Jr. as he successfully passes himself off as a pilot, a lawyer, and a doctor - all before his 21st birthday!

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Nightmare on Steves Street
programme.desc: Unnatural events in Steves (Steve Harvey) apartment may keep him from the Funk Cafes grand opening. Guest star: Robin Yvette Allen.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Big Mouth on Campus
programme.desc: Steve (Steve Harvey) declines running for the Teacher of the Year award so Cedric (Cedric The Entertainer) can win.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Liar, Liar Your Versaces on Fire
programme.desc: Steve and Cedric (Steve Harvey, Cedric The Entertainer) test lie-detector bracelets with not-so-good results.

programme.title: The Steve Harvey Show - Almost Dirty Dancing
programme.desc: Regina teaches a television producer how to dance; a famous photographer wants to take pictures of Lovita.

programme.title: Downright Delicious With Yo-Yo - Seafood Pasta Dish
programme.desc: In this episode Yo-Yo Jumps in the kitchen and makes one of her favorite seafood pasta dishes. On the menu is mac and cheese with jumbo lump crab meat. If you are ready to truly indulge in a food experience, you will not be disappointed in this meal.

programme.title: Downright Delicious With Yo-Yo - Big Bold Sandwiches
programme.desc: In this episode Yo-Yo is laying out big bold sandwiches so come hungry. First she builds the showstopper of all subs. Its the perfect sandwich for all types of gatherings, from a Friday night chill out to laying out the best food for a game day.

programme.title: Urban Indie Film Block - Girlhood 101
programme.desc: Celebrate all aspects of girlhood from school to friendships.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Carfool
programme.desc: Car-pool complications wreck Bernie; a boy in the car pool starts blackmailing Jordan to be his friend.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Mac Local 137
programme.desc: The kids go on strike for wages after Bernie tries to make them clean up their mess, so he hires neighborhood kids as scabs.

programme.desc: Back Pain? Hip? Sleep well thanks to this cooling topper!

programme.desc: Sometimes its revenge, regret and redeem all at once.

programme.title: Hustle, Sizzle, and Smoke - Oxtail and Sweet Potato
programme.desc: Jimmie Jackson of Jimmie Jerk Chicken faces off against Adaya Nijay of Atlanta Vegan Breakfast; the challenge is to turn oxtails and sweet potatoes into a delicious pairing.

programme.title: Hustle, Sizzle, and Smoke - Wings and Cabbage
programme.desc: Hanashi Weathers, AKA Da Rib Lady, competes against Lawrence McIntosh of Mo Betta Barbecue; they must tackle making delectable dishes featuring southern staples: wings and cabbage.

programme.title: Hustle, Sizzle, and Smoke - Burger and Potato
programme.desc: Jay Craddick from Twisted Dish grills it up against Amanda Kinsey-Joplin of Amandas BarBeeQue; the menu includes backyard barbecue staples like burgers and potatoes.

programme.title: Hustle, Sizzle, and Smoke - Brisket and Beans
programme.desc: Steve Morales of Smokey Steves BBQ competes with Markie Darling of Daddys Girl BBQ; the pitmasters are challenged with creating smoky and savory dishes featuring brisket and beans.

programme.title: Between Sisters
programme.desc: A bride and her sister set out to find their newly discovered siblings in order to invite them to the wedding.

programme.title: What Would You Do for Love?
programme.desc: A fitness trainer who was living paycheck to paycheck decides to keep his new multimillionaire status a secret when he goes on a dating blitz to find true love in 30 days or less.

programme.title: Family Time - No Lie Zone
programme.desc: Tony and Lisa ban all lying in the household, including the little white lies that hold the family together.

programme.title: Family Time - Lisas Leftovers
programme.desc: Lisa gets upset when her sister Lori begins dating her ex-boyfriend.

programme.title: Family Time - Powering Down
programme.desc: Tony feels his family is drifting apart so he bans technology in the household.

programme.title: Family Time - The Oops Baby
programme.desc: Tony and Lisa must deal with the possibility of a new baby.

programme.title: Family Time - Cut It Out
programme.desc: Tony spends time in the local barbershop with friends; Lori considers her options for having a baby.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Back in the Day
programme.desc: When heartburn sends him to the emergency room, Bernie resolves to beat his age by acting like he did in his youth.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Lockdown
programme.desc: After an intruder breaks into the house, Bernie reacts by turning it into a high-security compound, driving everyone crazy with his overprotectiveness.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Mac 101
programme.desc: Bernie becomes a stern taskmaster after witnessing the childrens behavior at dinner, cracking down on Vanessa for her grades and making Bryana speak Spanish all the time.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - If I Were N-riched, Man
programme.desc: After hearing it from Bernie at home, Bryana repeats inappropriate language at school, prompting a social worker to visit the house to discuss Bernies hostility problems.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Stop Having Sex
programme.desc: Bernie grows uncomfortable with the level of sexuality that is becoming part of his childrens lives.

programme.desc: Regina agrees to a date with Steves friend (Jonathan Slocum) if Steve will return the favor to one of hers.

programme.title: The Bye Bye Man (2017)

programme.title: Captive (2015)

programme.title: Top Gun (1986)
programme.desc: For Lieutenant Pete "Maverick" Mitchell and his friend and co-pilot Nick "Goose" Bradshaw, being accepted into an elite training school for fighter pilots is a dream come true. But a tragedy will threaten Petes dreams of becoming an ace pilot.

programme.title: Top Gun: Maverick (2022)

programme.title: Drop Zone (1994)
programme.desc: A U.S. marshal (Wesley Snipes) turns skydiver to nab a hijacker (Gary Busey) and his parachutist gang planning to invade the DEA.

programme.title: Road to Perdition (2002)
programme.desc: Accompanied by his eldest son, a Depression-era mob enforcer (Tom Hanks) seeks revenge after the rest of his family are murdered by his employers (Paul Newman) jealous son.

programme.title: Top Gun (1986)
